thread.title: Iggy Azalea's New Album Called 'Digital Distortion', Lead Single Out This Month
thread.title_full: Iggy Azalea's New Album Called 'Digital Distortion', Lead Single Out This Month

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Iggy Azalea's New Album Called 'Digital Distortion', Lead Single Out This Month
text:
Comments The 'Fancy' hitmaker announced her sophomore album title along with other details during a casual conversation with fans on Twitter on Tuesday night, October 6. 
Iggy Azalea will be back with her sophomore album titled "Digital Distortion" next year. The 25-year-old rapper announced her album title along with other details during a casual conversation with fans on Twitter on Tuesday night, October 6. A fan asked Iggy, "@IGGYAZALEA Middle Man, Zillion, Digital Distortion and CFTS right? hint hint ;-)" the "Fancy" hitmaker then replied, "@HausOfIggz digital distortion is not a song title, its the name of my album." Another fan asked Iggy when she would release the lead single. "This month," she replied. When asked if she would have any interesting collabs in her new album, Iggy responded, "I dont have any yet, but i will ask people soon." About the theme of "Digital Distortion", the rapper said, "There isnt much of a theme this time. its not like TNC where there were themes alot for things." Iggy said "Zillion" would be on her upcoming album. She finished her album cover on Sunday. in addition to the aforementioned "stuff"... I shot my album cover today and im really excited. â€” IGGY AZALEA (@IGGYAZALEA) October 5, 2015 "Digital Distortion" would be Iggy's second studio record, following her Grammy-nominated " The New Classic " from 2014, which featured the big hits "Fancy" and "Black Widow." She revealed that she would go on tour to promote her new album. Iggy has been teasing her new album by posting on Instagram some distorted pictures of her. A photo posted by Iggy Azalea (@thenewclassic) on Sep 7, 2015 at 3:43pm PDT
